quotes.quote: Alright, I've got the talking pillow now... Okay?
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: We tried to poison you. We tried to poison you because you are an insane, degenerate piece of filth and you deserve to die.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I do not believe fear to be an effective motivator. I want investment. For now, I'm simply interested in time frame.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: Hey, tell your douchebag brother-in-law to head towards the light
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Did you know that there's an acceptable level of rat turds that can go into candy bars?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: You won, Walter. You got the job. Do yourself a favor and learn to take yes for an answer.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: The thing is, if you just do stuff and nothing happens, what's it all mean? What's the point? Oh right, this whole thing is about self-acceptance.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: You are a time bomb, tick-tick-ticking. And I have no intention of being around for the boom.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: Don't drink and drive but if you do, call me.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I AM the danger!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: A guy opens his door and gets shot and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: If that's true, if you don't know who I am, then maybe your best course… would be to tread lightly.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Someone has to protect this family from the man who protects this family.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: Stay out of my territory.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I'm not in the meth business. I'm in the empire business.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You all know exactly who I am. Say my name.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I watched Jane die. I was there. And I watched her die.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And... I was really... I was alive.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Do you know how much I make a year? I mean, even if I told you, you wouldn't believe it.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Fuck you! And your eyebrows!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Send him to Belize? I'll send YOU to Belize.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: We're done when I say we're done.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: So you do have a plan? Yeah, Mr. White! Yeah, science!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: I'm a criminal, yo.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Yeah, bitch! Magnets!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Fire in the hole, bitch!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Did you just bring a bomb into a hospital?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Seriously? "Hello Kitty"?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Speak into the mic, bitch.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Better call Saul!
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: You do seem to have a little “shit creek” action going… You know, FYI, you can buy a paddle.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: You two suck at peddling meth.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Clearly, his taste in women is the same as his taste in lawyers.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Congratulations, you've just left your family a second-hand Subaru.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I'm not saying it's not bad. It's bad. But it could be worse.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I hide in plain sight, same as you.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: May his death satisfy you.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: I will kill your wife, I will kill your son, I will kill your infant daughter.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: Just because you shot Jesse James doesn't mean you are Jesse James.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: No more half-measures, Walter.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: Shut the fuck up and let me die in peace.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: I will put you under the jail.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: My name is ASAC Schrader, and you can go fuck yourself.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: They're minerals, Marie! Jesus!
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: Since when do vegans eat fried chicken?
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: You're the smartest guy I ever met, and you're too stupid to see he made up his mind 10 minutes ago.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: All I can do is wait... for the cancer to come back.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: Put me on your magical boat, man, and sail me down your chocolaty river of ****!
quotes.author: Badger

quotes.quote: The Universe is random. Not inevitable. It's simple chaos.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Sometimes it just feels better not to talk. At all. About anything. To anyone.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Name one thing in this world that is non negotiable.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You are not the guy. You're not capable of being the guy. I had a guy but now I don't. You are not the guy.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: If you don't know who I am, then maybe your best course would be to tread lightly.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You need to stop focusing on the darkness behind you. The past is the past. Nothing can change what we've done.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: This is my own private domicile and I will not be harassed... bitch!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: You don't want a criminal lawyer. You want a criminal lawyer.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: I Won.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You're never too old for balloons.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: I have spent my whole life scared frightened of things that could happen, might happen, might not happen.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Now, hey, remember, not all learning comes out of books.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Then why don't you just fucking die, already?
quotes.author: Walter Jr

quotes.quote: He handles the businesses, and I handle him.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Stop acting like such a baby.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Is that your fly-sabre?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Don't bullshit a bullshitter.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Some people are immune to good advice.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Well, technically, chemistry is the study of matter. But I prefer to see it as the study of change.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Find what you love and let it kill you.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Let's see, how shouild I put this? I'm in, you're out.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Never give up control. Live life on your own terms.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Fear is the real enemy.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: All bad things must come to an end.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Jesse, you asked me if I was in the meth business or the money business.. Neither. I'm in the empire business.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Sometimes the forbidden fruit tastes the sweetest.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: Free food always tastes good. Free drinks even better.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: My friends, I promise you that together, we will prosper.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: Now look buddy, the last thing I want to do is get you in hot water, but some meth monkey had a feeding frenzy in here.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: Fifty years I spent like that. Finding myself awake at three in the morning. But you know what? Ever since my diagnosis, I sleep just fine.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I told you, Skyler, I warned you for a solid year: you cross me, and there will be consequences.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I want my kids back. I want my life back. Please tell me - How much is enough? How big does this pile have to be?
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: It's easy money. Until we catch you.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: I once told a woman I was Kevin Costner and it worked because I believed it.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Scientists love lasers.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: If you're committed enough, you can make any story work.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Did I say you could open your mouth? And, hands off the car!
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: If you believe that there's a hell, we're pretty much already going there.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You add plus a douchebag to a minus douchebag and you get, Like, Zero Douchebags.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: A guy that clean has to be dirty.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: There is gold in the streets just waiting for someone to come and scoop it up.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: If I'm lucky, month from now, best-case scenario, I'm managing a Cinnabon in Omaha.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I am speaking to my family now. Skyler, you are the love of my life. I hope you know that.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I could have saved her
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I'm not a criminal. I'm a criminal lawyer.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I have lived under the threat of death for a year now, and because of that, I've made peace with it.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Fuck you Jimmy
quotes.author: Howard Hamlin

quotes.quote: Have you thought any more about the job offer?
quotes.author: Howard Hamlin

quotes.quote: You'll see why I call him Charlie Hustle
quotes.author: Howard Hamlin

quotes.quote: Can you give us the room?
quotes.author: Howard Hamlin

quotes.quote: Greatest legal mind I ever knew.
quotes.author: Howard Hamlin

quotes.quote: I'm so far beyond you! I'm a god in human clothing! Lightning bolts shoot from my fingertips!
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Do you know what a chicago sunroof is?
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: It's showtime.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Walter White couldn't have done it without me.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I travel in worlds you can't even imagine!
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: My friends, I promise you that together, we will prosper.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: I know what stoppped me then, and it's never stopping me again.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I was more than a willing participant.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: If I was your age, starting fresh, I would go to Alaska.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: You guys aren't half as smart as you think you are.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: Say you want this!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Nothing beats cash on hand. That's what Uncle Jack said.
quotes.author: Todd Alquist

quotes.quote: For five minutes today Chuck didn't hate me. I forgot what that felt like.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, it was him or us, and I chose us and I would do it again.
quotes.author: Todd Alquist

quotes.quote: We'll talk money once I get this right.
quotes.author: Todd Alquist

quotes.quote: Uncle Jack says life is what you make it.
quotes.author: Todd Alquist

quotes.quote: Yo, you were standing right on stage when they handed it to me. I totally graduated high school, dick.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Sorry kid, that's one thing you can never do.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: I'm no cop killer.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Great family, mom!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: You're a drug dealer.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: No, No, you listen to me. It's time for you to listen to me.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I just thought some allowance was in order once I heard about the **** lab. The one that used to be in the basement.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: I fucked Ted.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: You know the buisness. I know the chemistry.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I'm not turning down the money, I'm turning down you.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: I have never been more alone. I have nothing.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Run.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Please don't do this. You don't have to this.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: 6353 Juan Tabo Apartment 6
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You either run from things or you face them, Mr. White.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Just say the word and I'll take you on a ride along.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: So, I should stop judging and accept? So, no matter what I do, hooray for me, because I'm a great guy?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Where's the money Skyler!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I was told the man I was going to meet is a cautious man, a careful man. I believe we're alike in that way.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I thought we were going to Cold Stone Creamery.
quotes.author: Walter Jr

quotes.quote: It's nothing to me, it's a bacterium.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: Welcome to the Los Pollos Hermanos family.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: Apply yourself.
quotes.author: Walter White
